 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִדַּר‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 59 c</sup>)] **noun masculine** ==threshing-floor== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, Syr; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare Christian-Palestinian Aramaic [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex.3</sup>; hence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> as loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>136</sup>; conjectures on etymology [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh. 10</sup> [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>LCB 1882, 320</sup> [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>ZA vii (1892). 216</sup>); — plural construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִדְּרֵיקַֿיִט‎</span> [[Dan.2.35|Dan 2:35]].
